abstract: Dean Baquet, the managing editor, will review the weekly publication, with help from Deborah Needleman, the T Magazine editor.
snippet: Dean Baquet, the managing editor, will review the weekly publication, with help from Deborah Needleman, the T Magazine editor.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times Magazine will be reassessed by the newspaper’s managing editor, Dean Baquet, and Deborah Needleman, the editor of T Magazine, for the next three months before a new editor is appointed, according to a memo sent Thursday to employees.

headline.main: Times Will Study Potential Changes to Its Sunday Magazine
